description: French skater Sarah Abitbol says her former coach, Gilles Beyer, first raped her when she was 15.
title: French prosecutors to investigate rape claim of ice skating champion
title_page: French prosecutors to investigate rape claim of ice skating champion - BBC News
maintext: The former skater, who is now 44, rejected Mr Beyer's apology and said that she wanted accountability for "all those who covered up [the crimes¡§] both in the club and the federation".
